postBodyContent: “[On his casting in Star Wars: The Force Awakens] I’ve just been like, ‘Wow, I’m loving it.’ This is why I led my career on a different route, and I wanted to represent on a different scale since I started. I wanted it to be different, I wanted it to be unique. I wanted people to hopefully see me in a movie and feel like, you know what, he bridges the gap between what people think of Peckham, Deptford, and all that kind of stuff, and show that there are talents all around the world in different circumstances.”
I know you didn’t want him to go back to Afghanistan, but he is making money. He is being a good provider.

dear blue,

help me, obi-wan kenobi, you’re my o n l y  h o p e.

                                                                    happy birthday @leiaaorgana

The Elder Wand, the most powerful wand ever made. The Resurrection Stone. The Cloak of Invisibility. Together, they make the Deathly Hallows. Together, they make one master of death.

HARRY POTTER MEME » [4/6] spells, magical creatures, potions, and/or objects: The Deathly Hallows

hermione granger » “I’ve tried a few simple spells just for practice and its all worked for me. Nobody in my family’s magic at all. It was ever such a surprise when I got my letter, but I was ever so pleased, of course, I mean, it’s the very best school of witchcraft there is, I’ve heard, I’ve learnt all our set books off by heart, of course, I just hope it will be enough.”

You get to exhale now, Simon. You get to be more you than you have been in, in a very long time. You deserve everything you want.
Love, Simon (2018), dir. Greg Berlanti
Shout out to the amazing cast of The Maze Runner series. Thank you so much for bringing this story to life. Thank you for your joy, your laughs, your happiness. Thank you for everything.
